column4: When hardy comes out, can I upgrade seamlessly from 7.10 or is there gonna be some work to get everything working well?
completely? I have a bunch of psuedo-hackish crap that's making my compiz install, and it's a big feisty on 7.10 anyway, I think it might just decide to commit suicide if I upgrade the kernel
seemless might not be in your case.. it's pretty much for a clean system with no major mods.. begs the arguement for a separate /home
